funFacts.title: Did You Know?
funFacts.fact1: A single corn plant can have up to 600 kernels!
funFacts.fact2: Tomatoes are actually fruits, not vegetables!
funFacts.fact3: The world's largest pumpkin weighed over 2,600 pounds!
funFacts.fact4: Bees are responsible for pollinating 1/3 of the world's food crops!
funFacts.fact5: Rice is grown in water because it helps control weeds and pests!

successStories.title: Farmer Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Real farmers, real results with AgriSense

story1.title: Increased Yield by 30%
story1.description: Farmer Raj used our weather predictions to optimize his planting schedule and increased his rice yield by 30%!

story2.title: Saved Water & Money
story2.description: Maria reduced her water usage by 25% using our soil moisture monitoring system.

story3.title: Better Crop Health
story3.description: Ahmed prevented crop diseases by following our advisory alerts and saved his entire harvest.
